<Link id="l00404" /><CodeLine lineNumber="404"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">while</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!Q.empty()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00422" /><CodeLine lineNumber="422"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Simplifier::Context::replace(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a066e2a31a13d6520e52ae1944f194662">Value</a> &#42;OldV, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a066e2a31a13d6520e52ae1944f194662">Value</a> &#42;NewV) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00423" /><CodeLine lineNumber="423"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Root == OldV) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00424" /><CodeLine lineNumber="424"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Root = NewV;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00425" /><CodeLine lineNumber="425"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/localizer-cpp/#a428090a453f41a199ef67fc3f2179fbc">use</a>(Root);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00426" /><CodeLine lineNumber="426"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00427" /><CodeLine lineNumber="427"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00428" /><CodeLine lineNumber="428"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00429" /><CodeLine lineNumber="429"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// NewV may be a complex tree that has just been created by one of the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00430" /><CodeLine lineNumber="430"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// transformation rules. We need to make sure that it is commoned with</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00431" /><CodeLine lineNumber="431"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the existing Root to the maximum extent possible.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00432" /><CodeLine lineNumber="432"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Identify all subtrees of NewV (including NewV itself) that have</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00433" /><CodeLine lineNumber="433"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// equivalent counterparts in Root, and replace those subtrees with</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00434" /><CodeLine lineNumber="434"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// these counterparts.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00440" /><CodeLine lineNumber="440"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!U || <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/m68k/#ab3a288f2953d8eca3e363959fc2cf38ea4c614360da93c0a041b22e537de151eb">U</a>-&gt;getParent())</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00445" /><CodeLine lineNumber="445"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00446" /><CodeLine lineNumber="446"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a066e2a31a13d6520e52ae1944f194662">Value</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a> : <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/m68k/#ab3a288f2953d8eca3e363959fc2cf38ea4c614360da93c0a041b22e537de151eb">U</a>-&gt;operands())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00447" /><CodeLine lineNumber="447"><span class="doxyHighlight">        Q.push&#95;back(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00448" /><CodeLine lineNumber="448"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00449" /><CodeLine lineNumber="449"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00450" /><CodeLine lineNumber="450"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00451" /><CodeLine lineNumber="451"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Now, simply replace OldV with NewV in Root.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00846" /><CodeLine lineNumber="846"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Matched: select +++ ? (R &gt;&gt; 1) : (R &gt;&gt; 1) ^ Q</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00851" /><CodeLine lineNumber="851"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/patternmatch/#a25d956d9e0beadd47ce4bc255dfa811d">match</a>(FalseV, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/patternmatch/#ab8546ee1aaa68d6f4990e6241e24464c">m&#95;LShr</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/patternmatch/#aaf522908fe903018eb9b087dd6e49296">m&#95;Value</a>(R), <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/patternmatch/#a3b3d2d8c64a7881acb82bc7467569aa9">m&#95;One</a>())))</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00853" /><CodeLine lineNumber="853"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Matched: select +++ ? ... : (R &gt;&gt; 1)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00854" /><CodeLine lineNumber="854"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/patternmatch/#a25d956d9e0beadd47ce4bc255dfa811d">match</a>(TrueV, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/patternmatch/#a4e2ffa92003f2eca82197ea662b30f16">m&#95;c&#95;Xor</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/patternmatch/#a2d9861feadd3a09792967a012559e7b2">m&#95;Specific</a>(FalseV), <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/patternmatch/#aaf522908fe903018eb9b087dd6e49296">m&#95;Value</a>(Q))))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00855" /><CodeLine lineNumber="855"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00856" /><CodeLine lineNumber="856"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Matched: select +++ ? (R &gt;&gt; 1) ^ Q : (R &gt;&gt; 1)</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00858" /><CodeLine lineNumber="858"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00859" /><CodeLine lineNumber="859"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00860" /><CodeLine lineNumber="860"><span class="doxyHighlight">  PV.X = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/tablegen/tablegenbackendskeleton-cpp/#ab60f28d7a141ac46ccc200176a1bca8b">X</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00861" /><CodeLine lineNumber="861"><span class="doxyHighlight">  PV.Q = Q;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00862" /><CodeLine lineNumber="862"><span class="doxyHighlight">  PV.R = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/riscvfencefield/#a147be9e9780c1e33363ea572d4c7b25fa1835091d83e0e052cd1a32c99b2be731">R</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00863" /><CodeLine lineNumber="863"><span class="doxyHighlight">  PV.Left = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00864" /><CodeLine lineNumber="864"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00865" /><CodeLine lineNumber="865"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00866" /><CodeLine lineNumber="866"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00867" /><CodeLine lineNumber="867"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> PolynomialMultiplyRecognize::scanSelect(SelectInst &#42;SelI,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00868" /><CodeLine lineNumber="868"><span class="doxyHighlight">      BasicBlock &#42;LoopB, BasicBlock &#42;PrehB, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a066e2a31a13d6520e52ae1944f194662">Value</a> &#42;CIV, ParsedValues &amp;PV,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00869" /><CodeLine lineNumber="869"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> PreScan) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00870" /><CodeLine lineNumber="870"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">using namespace </span><span class="doxyHighlight">PatternMatch;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00871" /><CodeLine lineNumber="871"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00872" /><CodeLine lineNumber="872"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The basic pattern for R = P.Q is:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00873" /><CodeLine lineNumber="873"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// for i = 0..31</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00874" /><CodeLine lineNumber="874"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   R = phi (0, R&#39;)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00875" /><CodeLine lineNumber="875"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   if (P &amp; (1 &lt;&lt; i))        ; test-bit(P, i)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00876" /><CodeLine lineNumber="876"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     R&#39; = R ^ (Q &lt;&lt; i)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00877" /><CodeLine lineNumber="877"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00878" /><CodeLine lineNumber="878"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Similarly, the basic pattern for R = (P/Q).Q - P</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00879" /><CodeLine lineNumber="879"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// for i = 0..31</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00880" /><CodeLine lineNumber="880"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   R = phi(P, R&#39;)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00881" /><CodeLine lineNumber="881"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   if (R &amp; (1 &lt;&lt; i))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00882" /><CodeLine lineNumber="882"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     R&#39; = R ^ (Q &lt;&lt; i)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00883" /><CodeLine lineNumber="883"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00884" /><CodeLine lineNumber="884"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// There exist idioms, where instead of Q being shifted left, P is shifted</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00885" /><CodeLine lineNumber="885"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// right. This produces a result that is shifted right by 32 bits (the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00886" /><CodeLine lineNumber="886"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// non-shifted result is 64-bit).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00887" /><CodeLine lineNumber="887"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00888" /><CodeLine lineNumber="888"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For R = P.Q, this would be:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00889" /><CodeLine lineNumber="889"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// for i = 0..31</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00890" /><CodeLine lineNumber="890"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   R = phi (0, R&#39;)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00891" /><CodeLine lineNumber="891"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   if ((P &gt;&gt; i) &amp; 1)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00892" /><CodeLine lineNumber="892"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     R&#39; = (R &gt;&gt; 1) ^ Q      ; R is cycled through the loop, so it must</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00893" /><CodeLine lineNumber="893"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   else                     ; be shifted by 1, not i.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00894" /><CodeLine lineNumber="894"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     R&#39; = R &gt;&gt; 1</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00895" /><CodeLine lineNumber="895"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00896" /><CodeLine lineNumber="896"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// And for the inverse:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00897" /><CodeLine lineNumber="897"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// for i = 0..31</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00898" /><CodeLine lineNumber="898"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   R = phi (P, R&#39;)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00899" /><CodeLine lineNumber="899"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   if (R &amp; 1)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00900" /><CodeLine lineNumber="900"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     R&#39; = (R &gt;&gt; 1) ^ Q</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00901" /><CodeLine lineNumber="901"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   else</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00902" /><CodeLine lineNumber="902"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     R&#39; = R &gt;&gt; 1</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00903" /><CodeLine lineNumber="903"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00904" /><CodeLine lineNumber="904"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The left-shifting idioms share the same pattern:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00905" /><CodeLine lineNumber="905"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   select (X &amp; (1 &lt;&lt; i)) ? R ^ (Q &lt;&lt; i) : R</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00906" /><CodeLine lineNumber="906"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Similarly for right-shifting idioms:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00907" /><CodeLine lineNumber="907"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   select (X &amp; 1) ? (R &gt;&gt; 1) ^ Q</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00908" /><CodeLine lineNumber="908"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00909" /><CodeLine lineNumber="909"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (matchLeftShift(SelI, CIV, PV)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00910" /><CodeLine lineNumber="910"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If this is a pre-scan, getting this far is sufficient.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00911" /><CodeLine lineNumber="911"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (PreScan)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00912" /><CodeLine lineNumber="912"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00913" /><CodeLine lineNumber="913"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00914" /><CodeLine lineNumber="914"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Need to make sure that the SelI goes back into R.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00915" /><CodeLine lineNumber="915"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;RPhi = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;PHINode&gt;</a>(PV.R);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00916" /><CodeLine lineNumber="916"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!RPhi)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00917" /><CodeLine lineNumber="917"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00918" /><CodeLine lineNumber="918"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (SelI != RPhi-&gt;getIncomingValueForBlock(LoopB))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00919" /><CodeLine lineNumber="919"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00920" /><CodeLine lineNumber="920"><span class="doxyHighlight">    PV.Res = SelI;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00921" /><CodeLine lineNumber="921"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00922" /><CodeLine lineNumber="922"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If X is loop invariant, it must be the input polynomial, and the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00923" /><CodeLine lineNumber="923"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// idiom is the basic polynomial multiply.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00924" /><CodeLine lineNumber="924"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (CurLoop-&gt;isLoopInvariant(PV.X)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00925" /><CodeLine lineNumber="925"><span class="doxyHighlight">      PV.P = PV.X;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00926" /><CodeLine lineNumber="926"><span class="doxyHighlight">      PV.Inv = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00927" /><CodeLine lineNumber="927"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00928" /><CodeLine lineNumber="928"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// X is not loop invariant. If X == R, this is the inverse pmpy.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00929" /><CodeLine lineNumber="929"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Otherwise, check for an xor with an invariant value. If the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00930" /><CodeLine lineNumber="930"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// variable argument to the xor is R, then this is still a valid</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00931" /><CodeLine lineNumber="931"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// inverse pmpy.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00932" /><CodeLine lineNumber="932"><span class="doxyHighlight">      PV.Inv = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00933" /><CodeLine lineNumber="933"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (PV.X != PV.R) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00934" /><CodeLine lineNumber="934"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a066e2a31a13d6520e52ae1944f194662">Value</a> &#42;Var = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, &#42;Inv = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, &#42;X1 = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, &#42;X2 = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00935" /><CodeLine lineNumber="935"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/patternmatch/#a25d956d9e0beadd47ce4bc255dfa811d">match</a>(PV.X, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/patternmatch/#a1cacb72e897c55bdfd5c726d13d69af1">m&#95;Xor</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/patternmatch/#aaf522908fe903018eb9b087dd6e49296">m&#95;Value</a>(X1), <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/patternmatch/#aaf522908fe903018eb9b087dd6e49296">m&#95;Value</a>(X2))))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00936" /><CodeLine lineNumber="936"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00937" /><CodeLine lineNumber="937"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-dxilopbuilder-cpp-/#a3fe8fcf1f03e5da864eb86be303a3216a0bfbc695c285082c59ed77069aafbfae">I1</a> = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;Instruction&gt;</a>(X1);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00938" /><CodeLine lineNumber="938"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;I2 = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;Instruction&gt;</a>(X2);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00939" /><CodeLine lineNumber="939"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!I1 || <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-dxilopbuilder-cpp-/#a3fe8fcf1f03e5da864eb86be303a3216a0bfbc695c285082c59ed77069aafbfae">I1</a>-&gt;getParent() != LoopB) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00940" /><CodeLine lineNumber="940"><span class="doxyHighlight">          Var = X2;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00941" /><CodeLine lineNumber="941"><span class="doxyHighlight">          Inv = X1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00942" /><CodeLine lineNumber="942"><span class="doxyHighlight">        &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!I2 || I2-&gt;getParent() != LoopB) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00943" /><CodeLine lineNumber="943"><span class="doxyHighlight">          Var = X1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00944" /><CodeLine lineNumber="944"><span class="doxyHighlight">          Inv = X2;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00945" /><CodeLine lineNumber="945"><span class="doxyHighlight">        &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00946" /><CodeLine lineNumber="946"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00947" /><CodeLine lineNumber="947"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Var != PV.R)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00948" /><CodeLine lineNumber="948"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00949" /><CodeLine lineNumber="949"><span class="doxyHighlight">        PV.M = Inv;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00950" /><CodeLine lineNumber="950"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00951" /><CodeLine lineNumber="951"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The input polynomial P still needs to be determined. It will be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00952" /><CodeLine lineNumber="952"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the entry value of R.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00953" /><CodeLine lineNumber="953"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a066e2a31a13d6520e52ae1944f194662">Value</a> &#42;EntryP = RPhi-&gt;getIncomingValueForBlock(PrehB);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00954" /><CodeLine lineNumber="954"><span class="doxyHighlight">      PV.P = EntryP;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00955" /><CodeLine lineNumber="955"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00956" /><CodeLine lineNumber="956"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00957" /><CodeLine lineNumber="957"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00958" /><CodeLine lineNumber="958"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00959" /><CodeLine lineNumber="959"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00960" /><CodeLine lineNumber="960"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (matchRightShift(SelI, PV)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00961" /><CodeLine lineNumber="961"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If this is an inverse pattern, the Q polynomial must be known at</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00962" /><CodeLine lineNumber="962"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// compile time.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00963" /><CodeLine lineNumber="963"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (PV.Inv &amp;&amp; !<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a92ca992e52dddc420f4b069cae06dfbe">isa&lt;ConstantInt&gt;</a>(PV.Q))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00964" /><CodeLine lineNumber="964"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00965" /><CodeLine lineNumber="965"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (PreScan)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00966" /><CodeLine lineNumber="966"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00967" /><CodeLine lineNumber="967"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// There is no exact matching of right-shift pmpy.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00968" /><CodeLine lineNumber="968"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00969" /><CodeLine lineNumber="969"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00970" /><CodeLine lineNumber="970"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00971" /><CodeLine lineNumber="971"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00972" /><CodeLine lineNumber="972"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00973" /><CodeLine lineNumber="973"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00974" /><CodeLine lineNumber="974"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> PolynomialMultiplyRecognize::isPromotableTo(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a066e2a31a13d6520e52ae1944f194662">Value</a> &#42;Val,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00975" /><CodeLine lineNumber="975"><span class="doxyHighlight">      IntegerType &#42;DestTy) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00976" /><CodeLine lineNumber="976"><span class="doxyHighlight">  IntegerType &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/mips16isellowering-cpp/#a0acb682b8260ab1c60b918599864e2e5">T</a> = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;IntegerType&gt;</a>(Val-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value/#a0344a49526443edf90cc0aef3abd3337">getType</a>());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00977" /><CodeLine lineNumber="977"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/mips16isellowering-cpp/#a0acb682b8260ab1c60b918599864e2e5">T</a> || <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/mips16isellowering-cpp/#a0acb682b8260ab1c60b918599864e2e5">T</a>-&gt;getBitWidth() &gt; DestTy-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/integertype/#a90b790ccb1af4ea5ccd69db4b8cd2d81">getBitWidth</a>())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00978" /><CodeLine lineNumber="978"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00979" /><CodeLine lineNumber="979"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/mips16isellowering-cpp/#a0acb682b8260ab1c60b918599864e2e5">T</a>-&gt;getBitWidth() == DestTy-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/integertype/#a90b790ccb1af4ea5ccd69db4b8cd2d81">getBitWidth</a>())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00980" /><CodeLine lineNumber="980"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00981" /><CodeLine lineNumber="981"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Non-instructions are promotable. The reason why an instruction may not</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00982" /><CodeLine lineNumber="982"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// be promotable is that it may produce a different result if its operands</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00983" /><CodeLine lineNumber="983"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// and the result are promoted, for example, it may produce more non-zero</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00984" /><CodeLine lineNumber="984"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// bits. While it would still be possible to represent the proper result</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00985" /><CodeLine lineNumber="985"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// in a wider type, it may require adding additional instructions (which</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00986" /><CodeLine lineNumber="986"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// we don&#39;t want to do).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00987" /><CodeLine lineNumber="987"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sandboxir/#a75d3582b0f0bc7a5123de92ada301e97">Instruction</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/tgtok/#abbc5259d649363016626e2529fabe0c5a5fa7b4069ef3bd1ceb9f2caa315cf5ac">In</a> = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;Instruction&gt;</a>(Val);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00988" /><CodeLine lineNumber="988"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!In)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00989" /><CodeLine lineNumber="989"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00990" /><CodeLine lineNumber="990"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The bitwidth of the source type is smaller than the destination.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00991" /><CodeLine lineNumber="991"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Check if the individual operation can be promoted.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00992" /><CodeLine lineNumber="992"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">switch</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/tgtok/#abbc5259d649363016626e2529fabe0c5a5fa7b4069ef3bd1ceb9f2caa315cf5ac">In</a>-&gt;getOpcode()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00993" /><CodeLine lineNumber="993"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Instruction::PHI:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00994" /><CodeLine lineNumber="994"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Instruction::ZExt:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00995" /><CodeLine lineNumber="995"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Instruction::And:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00996" /><CodeLine lineNumber="996"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Instruction::Or:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00997" /><CodeLine lineNumber="997"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Instruction::Xor:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00998" /><CodeLine lineNumber="998"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Instruction::LShr: </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Shift right is ok.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00999" /><CodeLine lineNumber="999"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Instruction::Select:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01000" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1000"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Instruction::Trunc:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01001" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1001"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01002" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1002"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Instruction::ICmp:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01003" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1003"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (CmpInst &#42;CI = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac4fc845f5ed92de63cd4474f128f5fc5">cast&lt;CmpInst&gt;</a>(In))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01004" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1004"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> CI-&gt;isEquality() || CI-&gt;isUnsigned();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01005" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1005"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/errorhandling-h/#ace243f5c25697a1107cce46626b3dc94">llvm&#95;unreachable</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Cast failed unexpectedly&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01006" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1006"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Instruction::Add:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01007" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1007"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/tgtok/#abbc5259d649363016626e2529fabe0c5a5fa7b4069ef3bd1ceb9f2caa315cf5ac">In</a>-&gt;hasNoSignedWrap() &amp;&amp; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/tgtok/#abbc5259d649363016626e2529fabe0c5a5fa7b4069ef3bd1ceb9f2caa315cf5ac">In</a>-&gt;hasNoUnsignedWrap();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01008" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1008"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01009" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1009"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1010"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1011"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1064"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> PolynomialMultiplyRecognize::promoteTypes(BasicBlock &#42;LoopB,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1067"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Skip loops where the exit block has more than one predecessor. The values</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1068"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// coming from the loop block will be promoted to another type, and so the</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1074"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Check if the exit values have types that are no wider than the type</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1090"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1091"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Perform the promotion.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1092"><span class="doxyHighlight">  std::vector&lt;Instruction&#42;&gt; LoopIns;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1093"><span class="doxyHighlight">  std::transform(LoopB-&gt;begin(), LoopB-&gt;end(), std::back&#95;inserter(LoopIns),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1094"><span class="doxyHighlight">                 &#91;&#93;(Instruction &amp;In) &#123; return &amp;In; &#125;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1095"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Instruction &#42;In : LoopIns)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1096"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/tgtok/#abbc5259d649363016626e2529fabe0c5a5fa7b4069ef3bd1ceb9f2caa315cf5ac">In</a>-&gt;isTerminator())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1097"><span class="doxyHighlight">      promoteTo(In, DestTy, LoopB);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01485" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1485"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01486" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1486"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01487" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1487"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> PolynomialMultiplyRecognize::getInverseMxN(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> QP) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01488" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1488"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Arrays of coefficients of Q and the inverse, C.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01489" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1489"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Q&#91;i&#93; = coefficient at x^i.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01490" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1490"><span class="doxyHighlight">  std::array&lt;char,32&gt; Q, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cafd841a49aec1539bc88abc8ff9e170fb">C</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01491" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1491"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01492" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1492"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> i = 0; i &lt; 32; ++i) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01493" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1493"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Q&#91;i&#93; = QP &amp; 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01494" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1494"><span class="doxyHighlight">    QP &gt;&gt;= 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01495" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1495"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01496" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1496"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(Q&#91;0&#93; == 1);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01497" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1497"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01498" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1498"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Find C, such that</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01499" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1499"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// (Q&#91;n&#93;&#42;x^n + ... + Q&#91;1&#93;&#42;x + Q&#91;0&#93;) &#42; (C&#91;n&#93;&#42;x^n + ... + C&#91;1&#93;&#42;x + C&#91;0&#93;) = 1</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01500" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1500"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01501" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1501"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For it to have a solution, Q&#91;0&#93; must be 1 Since this is Z2&#91;x&#93;, the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01502" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1502"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// operations &#42; and + are &amp; and ^ respectively.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01503" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1503"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01504" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1504"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Find C&#91;i&#93; recursively, by comparing i-th coefficient in the product</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01505" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1505"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// with 0 (or 1 for i=0).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01506" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1506"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01507" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1507"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// C&#91;0&#93; = 1, since C&#91;0&#93; = Q&#91;0&#93;, and Q&#91;0&#93; = 1</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01508" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1508"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cafd841a49aec1539bc88abc8ff9e170fb">C</a>&#91;0&#93; = 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01509" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1509"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> i = 1; i &lt; 32; ++i) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01510" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1510"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Solve for C&#91;i&#93; in:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01511" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1511"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   C&#91;0&#93;Q&#91;i&#93; ^ C&#91;1&#93;Q&#91;i-1&#93; ^ ... ^ C&#91;i-1&#93;Q&#91;1&#93; ^ C&#91;i&#93;Q&#91;0&#93; = 0</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01512" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1512"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This is equivalent to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01513" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1513"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   C&#91;0&#93;Q&#91;i&#93; ^ C&#91;1&#93;Q&#91;i-1&#93; ^ ... ^ C&#91;i-1&#93;Q&#91;1&#93; ^ C&#91;i&#93; = 0</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01514" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1514"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// which is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01515" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1515"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   C&#91;0&#93;Q&#91;i&#93; ^ C&#91;1&#93;Q&#91;i-1&#93; ^ ... ^ C&#91;i-1&#93;Q&#91;1&#93; = C&#91;i&#93;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01516" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1516"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/mips16isellowering-cpp/#a0acb682b8260ab1c60b918599864e2e5">T</a> = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01517" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1517"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> j = 0; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/m68k/#ab3a288f2953d8eca3e363959fc2cf38ea363b122c528f54df4a0446b6bab05515">j</a> &lt; i; ++<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/m68k/#ab3a288f2953d8eca3e363959fc2cf38ea363b122c528f54df4a0446b6bab05515">j</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01518" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1518"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/mips16isellowering-cpp/#a0acb682b8260ab1c60b918599864e2e5">T</a> = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/mips16isellowering-cpp/#a0acb682b8260ab1c60b918599864e2e5">T</a> ^ (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cafd841a49aec1539bc88abc8ff9e170fb">C</a>&#91;j&#93; &amp; Q&#91;i-j&#93;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01519" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1519"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cafd841a49aec1539bc88abc8ff9e170fb">C</a>&#91;i&#93; = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/mips16isellowering-cpp/#a0acb682b8260ab1c60b918599864e2e5">T</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01520" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1520"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01521" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1521"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01522" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1522"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> QV = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01523" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1523"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> i = 0; i &lt; 32; ++i)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01524" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1524"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cafd841a49aec1539bc88abc8ff9e170fb">C</a>&#91;i&#93;)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01525" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1525"><span class="doxyHighlight">      QV |= (1 &lt;&lt; i);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01526" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1526"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01527" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1527"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> QV;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01528" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1528"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
